txt.en:
'You're a good sort, [placeholder], and I feel that I can trust you not to betray my confidence in another matter.

'When I was called back to Gabilshathûr for guard-duty, I did not have time to recover a hoard of gems I had mined within the canyons of Gorothlad. I left it a bit near to the cave-claw nests in southern Gorothlad, and the filthy creatures likely have it surrounded.

'Can you recover the gem-hoard for me? It does the cave-claws no good to have it, their love for shiny things notwithstanding; the Dwarves of Gabilshathûr will be able to put the gems to good use.'

'Well done, [placeholder]! I have done more good for Gabilshathûr while on guard-duty than I ever did while mining: those gem-bearing rocks mined with all due haste, and a hoard of gems retaken from the cave-claws almost as quickly!\n\n'You deserve all of the credit, of course. Do not let me understate your accomplishments! Take this reward -- it has been well-earned!'
'The cave-claws in the southern reaches of Gorothlad have likely taken my gem-hoard back to their nests. Look for them in the canyons south of Maethad, to the east of Gabilshathûr.'
'It seems to me that I am always being chosen for guard-duty.'
Bothwar has told you the location of a cache of gems he was unable to retrieve before he was assigned his current duty in Gabilshathûr.
The gem-hoard is near the cave-claw nests within Dolroth in southern Gorothlad, north and east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nThe dwarf-miner Bothwar has asked you to retrieve a hoard of gems for him.
